Hello

I am trying to create a triangular frame where each side is a cylindrical link. Each link is connected to the other two via a joint(like in a triangle). Is it possible to model this in SDF? The joint can be anything for now.
I am trying to import this into pybullet for simulation but the simulation dies. Is it because, I have a loop like structure defined in the SDF file?
The structure of the frame defined by me is as follows:
3 links- Link A,B and C
Joint#1 : parent A, child B
Joint#2 : parent B, child C
joint#3 : parent C, child A

Is this definition of joints and their corresponding parents and children valid in SDF format? Is there an alternative definition I could use?
I have attached a schematic of my system

Thank you!!
